text:
(...It's not going well.
What should I do...?)

I just got back.
...Oh, Hiori, good work.

...Producer,
Thank you for your hard work.

Hiori, how are you feeling?
If you're having trouble, feel free to talk to me anytime.

Oh, no...
It's not like that.

The three of us still haven't quite synced up.
...It's because I haven't put in enough effort.

...To say such harsh things to the members would be
grounds for disqualification as an idol, wouldn't it?

（......It seems like
Hiori is carrying everything by herself）

Hiori, you're not disqualified as an idol. Your dedication
is evidence of your seriousness towards idol activities.

That's... not an excuse. It's meaningless
if it doesn't get through to the others.

...In that case, how about having an extra lesson next time?
We should be able to figure it out that way.
